extendedInfo.description: Itâs now even easier for CPS Energy customers to control their energy usage with the Home Manager app for Android.  With this app you will be able to remotely control your HVAC, water heater, and pool pump, and monitor your usage in real time.  You can make adjustments to your thermostat, turn your water heater on or off, and even switch between preset programs.  The Home Manager app boasts several new features for Android:Â·        A streamlined, easy-to-use interfaceÂ·        A customizable graph showing 7 days of energy usageÂ·        A 24-hour usage summary for each deviceÂ·        The ability to manage multiple accountsÂ·        The ability to resume normal program settings with one clickThe Home Manager app only works for CPS Energy customers who have the Home Manager energy management system installed in their homes.  The system is FREE.  Visit http://www.cpsenergy.com/Energy_Guard to apply.

reviews.title: Works O.K.
reviews.comment: This app stops working from time to time. Needs improvement.
reviews.author: Jaime Arredondo

reviews.title: Needs work.
reviews.comment: Need an option to stay signed in without having to put the password in each time. It serves it\'s purpose but it lags at time. App needs major improvement and better developer support.
reviews.author: Carolyn Dickerson

reviews.title: Getting better
reviews.comment: New updates make for less crashing. Just hope they can mobilize \'program settings\' for long term energy usage in the future.
reviews.author: Samuel Vasquez

reviews.title: Can\'t submit
reviews.comment: I notice that there is submit cancel buttons at the bottom of the screen. When I change temp,it will do nothing. It would also be nice to stay logged in. If these are fixed ill give 5 stars.
reviews.author: Kevin Rock

reviews.title: Works but still needs work
reviews.comment: Let\'s me control everything very easily. But doesn\'t keep me logged in and crashes after I leave the app. Works great, logged in just fine. Let\'s me see and control everything I can see online. Unfortunately it doesn\'t keep me signed on after closing and also crashes after closing. -- New version doesn\'t crash so much, but still wants me to log out when I back out. If I just close the app it asks me to log in again, but the back button gets in to the app without logging in. Also no change log is annoying.
reviews.author: Thomas Orrock

reviews.title: Nice, but...
reviews.comment: The wizard  is a nice way to get started but the app won\'t let you deviate like setting a specific temp while on vacation.  You are forced to use the away temp set in the wizard.
reviews.author: Roger Topping

reviews.title: S3 Samsung
reviews.comment: App won\'t log in.  Not respond ing.
reviews.author: Steven Ybarra

reviews.title: Dont work
reviews.comment: I cant log in
reviews.author: Victor v

reviews.title: Won\'t log in
reviews.comment: Please fix.
reviews.author: Avery Johnson

reviews.title: Much better than using website on my phone
reviews.comment: Works great on my Galaxy S-2 easy to use and not a single problem so far.
reviews.author: Tom DeAngelis

reviews.title: Good start,  but needs updating.
reviews.comment: Ok, so I\'m glad that Cps finally came out with an app, but it still needs a better UI. For starters it should have at least a quick login. Like a 4 digit pass code. The developer should be fired for producing something below the average of a 16 year old developer. Seriously? I hope this was not done in house with someone volunteering to do the app.
reviews.author: Jesse Ayar

reviews.title: Great but.....
reviews.comment: It works well for me on my nexus 4. I would like to see an actual button for seeing usage details without having to turn my phone side ways. I like having auto rotate turned off and that prevents me from not seeing the usage without changing my setting. But that is a minor annoyance. Overall I am happy with the app
reviews.author: Trey Clark

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Installed fine, works fine, thanks cps, best electric company I\'ve ever dealt with.  All this for free and people complain.
reviews.author: Ricky Patel

reviews.comment: Great app.  Wish they could translate usage into dollars.
reviews.author: Sonia Gerard DeGuelle

reviews.title: Error message at all times
reviews.comment: It always getting stuck really inconvenient
reviews.author: veronica moreno

reviews.title: Galaxy S 3 user
reviews.comment: Not responding. App will not start.
reviews.author: George Valdillez

reviews.title: Can\'t log in
reviews.comment: It won\'t let me log in, I uninstalled then reinstalled it, no change. Guess I won\'t be using it.
reviews.author: Annie S

reviews.title: Fix the login.
reviews.comment: Makes no sense to come up with a secure login and then be asked to retype it every time you login. Auto save the password. Other than that it does what it needs to.
reviews.author: Paul Ramirez

reviews.comment: Needs work but good start.
reviews.author: Michael Sommers

reviews.title: Works?
reviews.comment: Force closes constantly, won\'t apply changes, rotate view doesn\'t work, doesn\'t stay logged in.
reviews.author: Jordan Nelson
